title: Katy Perry Includes Both Justin Trudeau & Ex Orlando Bloom in ‘Holidaze’ Photo Roundup
summary: The pop star is continuing to co-parent her daughter with her former fiancé.
body: Katy Perry ‘s holiday season was full of love, with the pop star spending quality time with both Justin Trudeau, who she’s been dating since last year, and ex-fiancé Orlando Bloom. Related A Timeline of Katy Perry & Justin Trudeau’s Relationship Katy Perry Joins Justin Trudeau for Diplomatic Lunch With Former Japanese Prime Minister Watch Katy Perry Hilariously Bite Into a Cardboard Cake She Thought Might Be Real: ‘Agh, F–k’ In a post on Instagram on Wednesday (Jan. 7), Perry shared a roundup of photos and videos of her time spent celebrating Christmas and New Year’s. In one photo, she nuzzles into the Canadian politician’s neck as he beams at the camera, the pair enjoying a day on the water somewhere warm. In another, the singer shares her POV while out on a walk with the Pirates of the Caribbean star and their daughter, Daisy Dove. “Holidaze,” Perry captioned the post, which also features clips of her Christmas tree and her “2026” NYE glasses, as well as a snap of a cluster of table-setting name cards reading “Katy,” “Orlando,” “Daisy” and “Flynn,&#8221…
